# Templates

Ready-to-use agent templates demonstrating common patterns. Each template is a working agent in the [`examples/`](https://github.com/AgentlyHQ/aixyz/tree/main/examples) directory that you can clone and customize.

## Auto-Generated Server

These templates use `app/agent.ts` + `app/tools/` only — no `server.ts` needed. The framework auto-generates the server.

| Template                                                 | Description                                         |
| -------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| [Boilerplate](/docs/templates/agent-boilerplate)         | Minimal unit conversion agent — best starting point |
| [BYO Facilitator](/docs/templates/agent-byo-facilitator) | Custom x402 facilitator via `app/accepts.ts`        |
| [Chainlink Oracle](/docs/templates/agent-chainlink)      | On-chain Chainlink price feeds                      |
| [Job Hunter](/docs/templates/agent-job-hunter)           | Remote job search via Jobicy API                    |
| [Price Oracle](/docs/templates/agent-price-oracle)       | CoinGecko crypto market data                        |
| [Testing](/docs/templates/agent-with-tests)              | Agent with Bun test examples                        |

## Custom Server

These templates use `app/server.ts` for full control over endpoint registration and pricing.

| Template                                                  | Description                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| [Travel Agent](/docs/templates/agent-travel)              | Flight search + Stripe payments |
| [Custom Server](/docs/templates/agent-with-custom-server) | Minimal custom server reference |

## Using a Template

```bash
# Clone the repo and copy a template
git clone https://github.com/AgentlyHQ/aixyz.git
cp -r aixyz/examples/agent-boilerplate my-agent
cd my-agent
bun install
bun run dev
```

Or start fresh with `create-aixyz-app`:

```bash
bunx create-aixyz-app my-agent
```
